includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: A documentary crew arrives at the dysfunctional office of a paper company, hoping to gain an insight into the intricacies of modern management.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A documentary crew arrives at the dysfunctional office of a paper company, hoping to gain an insight into the intricacies of modern management.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A documentary crew arrives at the dysfunctional office of a paper company, hoping to gain an insight into the intricacies of modern management.

includedAssets.title: Diversity Day
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael's actions force the staff into a painstaking diversity seminar. Meanwhile, Jim struggles to hold on to a lucrative contract.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael's actions force the staff into a painstaking diversity seminar. Meanwhile, Jim struggles to hold on to a lucrative contract.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael's actions force the staff into a painstaking diversity seminar. Meanwhile, Jim struggles to hold on to a lucrative contract.

includedAssets.title: Health Care
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael asks Dwight to slash the company's healthcare costs, then disastrously attempts to cheer up the annoyed staff.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael asks Dwight to slash the company's healthcare costs, then disastrously attempts to cheer up the annoyed staff.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael asks Dwight to slash the company's healthcare costs, then disastrously attempts to cheer up the annoyed staff.

includedAssets.title: The Alliance
includedAssets.synopsis: As downsizing rumours spread around the office, Jim and Dwight make a pact in an attempt to protect their own jobs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As downsizing rumours spread around the office, Jim and Dwight make a pact in an attempt to protect their own jobs.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As downsizing rumours spread around the office, Jim and Dwight make a pact in an attempt to protect their own jobs.

includedAssets.title: Basketball
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael leads the office staff in a basketball match against the warehouse team.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael leads the office staff in a basketball match against the warehouse team.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael leads the office staff in a basketball match against the warehouse team.

includedAssets.title: Hot Girl
includedAssets.synopsis: The men in the office desperately vie for the attention of a beautiful saleswoman (guest star Amy Adams).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The men in the office desperately vie for the attention of a beautiful saleswoman (guest star Amy Adams).
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The men in the office desperately vie for the attention of a beautiful saleswoman (guest star Amy Adams).

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: The dysfunctional staff of a paper company are filmed by a documentary crew hoping to learn more about modern office life. First season of the smash-hit US remake of the British comedy phenomenon. Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson and John Krasinski star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A dysfunctional office is filmed by a documentary crew hoping to learn more about working life. Season one of the hit US remake of the British comedy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The dysfunctional staff of a paper company are filmed by a documentary crew hoping to learn more about modern office life. First season of the smash-hit US remake of the British comedy phenomenon. Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson and John Krasinski star.

includedIn.title: The Office
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A documentary crew record the daily lives of the dysfunctional staff of a Pennsylvania paper company in the hope of learning more about office life.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A documentary crew record the daily lives of the dysfunctional staff of a Pennsylvania paper company in the hope of learning more about office life.

title: The Office Season 1
synopsis: The dysfunctional staff of a paper company are filmed by a documentary crew hoping to learn more about modern office life. First season of the smash-hit US remake of the British comedy phenomenon. Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson and John Krasinski star.
shortSynopsis: A dysfunctional office is filmed by a documentary crew hoping to learn more about working life. Season one of the hit US remake of the British comedy.
